alert.note: Alert for St. Charles (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 07 at 11:13AM CDT until May 11 at 5:00AM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Missouri...Illinois... Mississippi River at St. Louis. Mississippi River at Hannibal. Mississippi River at Grafton. Mississippi River at Mel Price LD. Mississippi River at Winfield. Mississippi River at Clarksville. Mississippi River at Chester. Mississippi River at Louisiana. River forecasts are based on observed precipitation and forecast precipitation for the next 24 hours. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY WEDNESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Mississippi River at Mel Price LD. * WHEN...Until early Wednesday morning. * IMPACTS...At 24.0 feet, Alta Villa Road off of Highway 94 north of West Alton is closed within a foot of this height. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:00 AM CDT Saturday the stage was 23.7 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 11:00 AM CDT Saturday was 23.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage late Monday evening and continue falling to 18.1 feet Friday morning. - Flood stage is 21.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (1 pm CDT) Location Stg Stg 1 pm Sun Mon Tue Wed Thu Mississippi River Mel Price LD 21.0 23.7 22.6 21.4 20.5 19.5 18.7 &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. This product, along with additional weather and stream information, is available at https://water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=lsx.
